issue.title: [Rust] Add fast paths for common utf8 like patterns
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10665](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10665). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
patterns '%xxx'  'xxx%' and '%xxx' can use faster methods from rust standard lib instead.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10665?focusedCommentId=17237863) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
